Headline: #80 Irving Park Temporary Westbound Reroute near Irving Park/Ashland
ShortDescription: Westbound 80 Irving Park buses are temp. rerouted via Irving Park, Ashland, Montrose, Damen and Irving Park: due to, police activity near Irving Park/Ashland.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #80 Irving Park buses are temporarily rerouted via Irving Park, Ashland, Montrose, Damen and Irving Park: due to, police activity near Irving Park/Ashland.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
